com.polarion.alm.shared.api.utils.html

Interface HtmlAttributesBuilder


  • public interface HtmlAttributesBuilder
    Builder for specifying optional attributes of html tag.
    Since:
    3.9.0

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HtmlAttributesBuilder align(java.lang.String value)
      Adds and encodes the value for align attribute.

      HtmlAttributesBuilder border(java.lang.String value)

                                  java.lang.String value)
        Adds and encodes the value for id attribute.
        Parameters:
        value - - not encoded value, can be null - when null than the attribute will not be in the result

      • className

        @NotNull
HtmlAttributesBuilder className(@Nullable
                                         java.lang.String value)

        Parameters:
        value - - not encoded value, can be null - when null than the attribute will not be in the result

      • byName

        @NotNull
HtmlAttributesBuilder byName(@NotNull
                                      java.lang.String name,
                                      @Nullable
                                      java.lang.String value)
        Adds value for attribute specified by name and encodes the value except when name is "href" or "src" (not case sensitive)
        Parameters:
        name - name of attribute
        value - value of attribute
        Returns:
        instance of this builder to allow method chaining

      • readOnly

        @NotNull
HtmlAttributesBuilder readOnly()
        The read only attribute is a boolean attribute and is property of input element. When present, it specifies that an input field is read-only.
        Since:
        3.9.2

      • booleanAttribute

        @NotNull
HtmlAttributesBuilder booleanAttribute(@NotNull
                                                java.lang.String name)
        Boolean attribute is defined only by name (e.g. readonly). When it is present, property is set to true otherwise is false.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the attribute
        Since:
        3.9.2
